newsitem.title: ZAMBIA: ZAMBIA PUTS PREMIUM OIL INDUSTRIES UP FOR SALE.
newsitem.headline: ZAMBIA PUTS PREMIUM OIL INDUSTRIES UP FOR SALE.

text.p: Zambia has invited bids for edible oil manufacturers Premium Oil Industries Ltd as part of the country's privatisation plan, the Zambia Privatisation Agency said on Friday.
"The government is inviting offers for the acquisition of 100 percent shares in the company without liabilities. Liabilities will be dealt with seperately by ZPA," an agency spokesman said.

Premium Oil is one of Zambia's two largest suppliers of cooking oil and is Zambia's main seed crusher. It is the only company in Zambia with a large seed expelling capacity and solvent extraction rate.
The company is located in Lusaka and has 365 employees.
